question: Will 'Challengers' gross less than $16m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Challengers' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt16426418/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (April 26 - April 28) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Challengers' (2024) grosses less than $16,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by May 6, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

question: Will 'Challengers' gross between $16m and $19m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Challengers' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt16426418/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (April 26 - April 28) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Challengers' (2024) grosses between $16,000,000 (inclusive) and $19,000,000 (exclusive) on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by May 6, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

question: Kendrick track drops in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kendrick Lamar officially releases a new song/track, as a lead artist, between April 22, 2024, 11:59 PM PT and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM PT. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be Apple Music, Spotify, credible music news outlets, or any major streaming platform.

question: NBA: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. New Orleans Pelicans 2024-04-24
description:
This market refers to Game 2 of the NBA Playoff series between the Oklahoma City Thunder and New Orleans Pelicans. 

If the Oklahoma City Thunder win, the market will resolve to “Thunder”.

If the New Orleans Pelicans win, the market will resolve to “Pelicans”.

If the game is not completed by April 30, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Boston Celtics vs. Miami Heat 2024-04-24
description:
This market refers to Game 2 of the NBA Playoff series between the Boston Celtics and Miami Heat. 

If the Boston Celtics win, the market will resolve to “Celtics”.

If the Miami Heat win, the market will resolve to “Heat”.

If the game is not completed by April 30, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Retardio listed on CoinMarketCap in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Retardio (RETARDIO) is listed on CoinMarketCap by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" Retardio must be directly listed - if CoinMarketCap merely shows dex pairings (e.g. https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/solana/5eLRsN6qDQTQSBF8KdW4B8mVpeeAzHCCwaDptzMyszxH/) it will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes".

The resolution source for this market is CoinMarketCap (https://coinmarketcap.com/).

events.title: Retardio listed on CoinMarketCap in April?

question: Columbia protesters expelled in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any students at Columbia University are expelled from the university activities related to the pro-Palestine protests taking place on-campus between April 23, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Columbia University, however, a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

question: Will $MFER hit $1 Billion FDV before June?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the FDV of $MFER reaches $1,000,000,000.00 or greater for five consecutive minutes between April 23, 2024, 2:00 PM ET, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be 1 minute price candles for $MFER available at https://dexscreener.com/base/0x7ec18abf80e865c6799069df91073335935c4185, viewed by clicking Price and 1m on the top row of the chart. Specifically, five consecutive 1-minute price candles need to all have Low prices which, when multiplied by the total supply of $MFER, provide an FDV $1,000,000,000.00 or greater for this market to resolve to “Yes.”

If the five minute period starts at e.g. May 31, 11:58 PM ET to June 1, 12:02 AM ET, it will count for this market.

events.title: Will $MFER hit $1 Billion FDV before June?

question: Will $BOME hit $5 Billion FDV before June?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the FDV of $BOME reaches $5,000,000,000.00 or greater for five consecutive minutes between April 23, 2024, 2:00 PM ET, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be 1 minute price candles for $BOME available at https://dexscreener.com/solana/dsuvc5qf5ljhhv5e2td184ixotsncnwj7i4jja4xsrmt, viewed by clicking Price and 1m on the top row of the chart. Specifically, five consecutive 1-minute price candles need to all have Low prices which, when multiplied by the total supply of $BOME, provide an FDV $5,000,000,000.00 or greater for this market to resolve to “Yes.”

If the five minute period starts at e.g. May 31, 11:58 PM ET to June 1, 12:02 AM ET, it will count for this market.

events.title: Will $BOME hit $5 Billion FDV before June?

question: Will Columbia divest from Israel by end of May?
description:
This market will resolve to 'Yes" if Columbia University publicly announces its intention to divest from companies or funds linked to Israel by May 31, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Note: This market will resolve based on official announcements from Columbia University and does not require any actual divestment to occur in order to resolve.  

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Columbia University, however a consensus of credible sources may also be used.

events.title: Will Columbia divest from Israel by end of May?

question: Drake Maye or Jayden Daniels drafted first?
description:
This market is on whether Drake Maye or Jayden Daniels will be drafted first in the 2024 NFL Draft. 

This market will resolve to 'Maye' if Drake Maye is drafted before Jayden Daniels.

This market will resolve to 'Daniels' if Jayden Daniels is drafted before Drake Maye.

If neither player is drafted in the 2024 NFL Draft this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Drake Maye or Jayden Daniels drafted first?
